trans-unit.source: Handles the painting functionality for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects, applying a custom palette and a streamlined style.
ToolStripProfessionalRenderer creates pens and brushes based on a replaceable color table called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref> to be used for painting.
Gets the color palette used for painting.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref> used for painting.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Draws the item background.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemCheck"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemImage"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemText"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSeparator"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparatorRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the OnRenderSplitButtonBackground event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBorder"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripPanelBackground"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnRenderToolStripStatusLabelBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether edges of controls have a rounded rather than a square or sharp appearance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to round off control edges; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
